physical_appearance:This is a 4-page typescript paper publication. It consists of two sheets of paper. The titles and illustrations are handwritten and drawn in coloured inks
 while the articles are typed. The title of the publication is printed at the top-left of the bottom page
 in blue
 with the publication date and issue printed below it. The clipping is slightly browned
 and is folded especially along the corners.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a 4-page typescript paper publication. It consists of two sheets of paper. The titles and illustrations are handwritten and drawn in coloured inks, while the articles are typed. The title of the publication is printed at the top-left of the bottom page, in blue, with the publication date and issue printed below it. The clipping is slightly browned, and is folded especially along the corners.
